name: APPARTA LLC
description: Developer of a booking application designed to optimize restaurant productivity, drive dine-in traffic, and fill empty tables. The company platform based on the yield management strategy, offers higher discounts in off-peak hours and lower discounts in high-demand hours, enabling people to save money every time they go out to eat.
one_liner: Developer of a booking application designed to optimize restaurant productivity, drive dine-in traffic, and fill empty tables. The company platform based on the yield management strategy, offers higher discounts in off-peak hours and lower discounts in high-demand hours, enabling people to save money every time they go out to eat.

name: Istidamat Albarakah Technology Holding Limited
description: Developer of online marketplace for food retailers designed to help them sell their surplus products & meals. The company provides a green discount on their surplus items using the mobile app in real-time to provide extra food to those who need it, it also provides merchants with a dashboard that illustrates business insights and impact analytics, highlighting operational efficiency and contribution towards ESG (environmental, social, and governance) objectives, enabling restaurants, bakeries, hotels, and supermarkets to reduce food waste and help the ecosystem to get better.
one_liner: Developer of online marketplace for food retailers designed to help them sell their surplus products & meals. The company provides a green discount on their surplus items using the mobile app in real-time to provide extra food to those who need it, it also provides merchants with a dashboard that illustrates business insights and impact analytics, highlighting operational efficiency and contribution towards ESG (environmental, social, and governance) objectives, enabling restaurants, bakeries, hotels, and supermarkets to reduce food waste and help the ecosystem to get better.

name: Beervana International Limited
description: Producer and distributor of craft beer headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. The company's products are hand-picked and served fresh, and cold beverages from cradle to glass.
one_liner: Producer and distributor of craft beer headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. The company's products are hand-picked and served fresh, and cold beverages from cradle to glass.

name: BoxGreen Food For Good Inc.
description: Provider of an online snack delivery service intended to deliver nutritious snacks to the doorstep. The company's service includes healthy snacks with wholesome ingredients that are natural and free from artificial flavoring and coloring every month, enabling consumers to consume them without affecting their health and stay fit.
one_liner: Provider of an online snack delivery service intended to deliver nutritious snacks to the doorstep. The company's service includes healthy snacks with wholesome ingredients that are natural and free from artificial flavoring and coloring every month, enabling consumers to consume them without affecting their health and stay fit.

name: ChalDal, Inc.
description: Operator of an online shopping platform intended to offer groceries and daily essential products. The company's platform offers baby products, personal care products, pet food and groceries, enabling customers to buy goods of their own choice and get them delivered to their doorstep.
one_liner: Operator of an online shopping platform intended to offer groceries and daily essential products. The company's platform offers baby products, personal care products, pet food and groceries, enabling customers to buy goods of their own choice and get them delivered to their doorstep.

name: CHEAF TECHNOLOGIES INC
description: Operator of a food technology platform intended to end food waste in stores and restaurants. The company's platform allows affiliated businesses to sell their surpluses at a discount and users of the platform to salvage delicious food for a fraction of the original price, enabling restaurants and businesses to recoup part of their production costs and the users to enjoy food dishes at discounted prices.
one_liner: Operator of a food technology platform intended to end food waste in stores and restaurants. The company's platform allows affiliated businesses to sell their surpluses at a discount and users of the platform to salvage delicious food for a fraction of the original price, enabling restaurants and businesses to recoup part of their production costs and the users to enjoy food dishes at discounted prices.

name: Chefs for Seniors, Inc
description: Provider of in-home meal preparation services intended to serve senior citizens. The company's services focus on placing a professional chef in homes to make customized, nutritious and affordable meals as per specific dietary concerns and preferences for the week, enabling aged people and senior citizens to avoid cooking meals for themselves, eat healthy food and stay independent.
one_liner: Provider of in-home meal preparation services intended to serve senior citizens. The company's services focus on placing a professional chef in homes to make customized, nutritious and affordable meals as per specific dietary concerns and preferences for the week, enabling aged people and senior citizens to avoid cooking meals for themselves, eat healthy food and stay independent.

name: Chewse, Inc.
description: Provider of an online food catering platform designed to offer group meals. The company's online platform offers a virtual meal manager, local restaurants, in-house drivers and on-site meal hosts for people to search database of local restaurant and catering menus as well as place their orders, enabling users to access catering options as per their tastes and budget, pay online and receive food.
one_liner: Provider of an online food catering platform designed to offer group meals. The company's online platform offers a virtual meal manager, local restaurants, in-house drivers and on-site meal hosts for people to search database of local restaurant and catering menus as well as place their orders, enabling users to access catering options as per their tastes and budget, pay online and receive food.

name: Chickin Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of agro-technology application designed to solve challenges faced by local farmers. The company's platform allows farmers to input data, including daily, sales and production data, to enhance performance and make it more measurable and at the same time, minimize risks through preventive measures, enabling farmers in the management of the poultry farm, data, IoT configuration adaptable to climate, temperature and humidity as well as recording the age of each poultry.
one_liner: Developer of agro-technology application designed to solve challenges faced by local farmers. The company's platform allows farmers to input data, including daily, sales and production data, to enhance performance and make it more measurable and at the same time, minimize risks through preventive measures, enabling farmers in the management of the poultry farm, data, IoT configuration adaptable to climate, temperature and humidity as well as recording the age of each poultry.

name: Grupo Devan SAPI de CV
description: Operator of a food delivery platform intended to offer healthy food. The company's platform lists vegetarian, low-carb, gluten-free, chicken dishes, beef dishes, homemade dishes, salads, sandwiches and wraps, enabling working professionals and corporates to consume different varieties of healthy food meals every day, with fresh and local ingredients.
one_liner: Operator of a food delivery platform intended to offer healthy food. The company's platform lists vegetarian, low-carb, gluten-free, chicken dishes, beef dishes, homemade dishes, salads, sandwiches and wraps, enabling working professionals and corporates to consume different varieties of healthy food meals every day, with fresh and local ingredients.

name: DailyMealz Inc.
description: Developer of a food delivery platform designed to promote healthy eating with authentic taste. The company's platform helps users in making subscriptions for a week or a month and offers healthy meals with a variety of local products every day, enabling users to get their nutritious and healthy meals delivered to their doorsteps.
one_liner: Developer of a food delivery platform designed to promote healthy eating with authentic taste. The company's platform helps users in making subscriptions for a week or a month and offers healthy meals with a variety of local products every day, enabling users to get their nutritious and healthy meals delivered to their doorsteps.

name: EIGHTY 6 HOLDING LIMITED
description: Developer of an online procurement tool intended to bridge the gap between restaurants and suppliers by making ordering and fulfillment hassle-free. The company's platform allows the buyer to review, place orders, and track orders on the go allowing the vendors to aggregate, promote, and communicate with several buyers at the touch of a button, enabling restaurants to streamline and facilitate the entire procurement process by getting access to a procurement app and communication channel.
one_liner: Developer of an online procurement tool intended to bridge the gap between restaurants and suppliers by making ordering and fulfillment hassle-free. The company's platform allows the buyer to review, place orders, and track orders on the go allowing the vendors to aggregate, promote, and communicate with several buyers at the touch of a button, enabling restaurants to streamline and facilitate the entire procurement process by getting access to a procurement app and communication channel.

name: FarMart Service Private Limited
description: Developer of food supply platform designed to connect farmers and share farm-related information easily. The company's platform connects farmers with retailers and food businesses and helps in sourcing farm produce at competitive prices, enabling farmers to sell their products easily.
one_liner: Developer of food supply platform designed to connect farmers and share farm-related information easily. The company's platform connects farmers with retailers and food businesses and helps in sourcing farm produce at competitive prices, enabling farmers to sell their products easily.

name: Freshop, Inc.
description: Developer of an online platform for grocers. The company's platform helps in shopping groceries on the user's tablet and mobile device interfaces and explore various products.
one_liner: Developer of an online platform for grocers. The company's platform helps in shopping groceries on the user's tablet and mobile device interfaces and explore various products.

name: GoodsMart International Holdings Limited
description: Developer of online grocery delivery application designed to provide grocery products from a variety of local shops and suppliers. The company's application lets consumers purchase household products and groceries online with an early morning next-day drop-off time, enabling consumers to receive grocery and home products delivered straight to their homes and save time in the process.
one_liner: Developer of online grocery delivery application designed to provide grocery products from a variety of local shops and suppliers. The company's application lets consumers purchase household products and groceries online with an early morning next-day drop-off time, enabling consumers to receive grocery and home products delivered straight to their homes and save time in the process.

name: Grain Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of an online food delivery platform designed to serve food delivery of different preferences through online orders. The company's platform offers everyday meals and catering services featuring chef-crafted meals made with fresh and wholesome ingredients, enabling users to order healthy and fresh meals and satisfy their food experiences.
one_liner: Developer of an online food delivery platform designed to serve food delivery of different preferences through online orders. The company's platform offers everyday meals and catering services featuring chef-crafted meals made with fresh and wholesome ingredients, enabling users to order healthy and fresh meals and satisfy their food experiences.

name: Hamptons Lane, Inc
description: Operator of an online platform intended to offer specialty kitchen tools and artisan ingredients. The company's online platform offers curated themed boxes which are delivered to the home and includes tools and pantry ingredients, along with recipes, enabling customers to discover new cooking techniques and new flavors.
one_liner: Operator of an online platform intended to offer specialty kitchen tools and artisan ingredients. The company's online platform offers curated themed boxes which are delivered to the home and includes tools and pantry ingredients, along with recipes, enabling customers to discover new cooking techniques and new flavors.

name: WEAREHANGRY PTE. LTD.
description: Opeartor of a multi-brand delivery-only restaurant platform designed for consumers looking for a variety of food options. The company's platform offers a selection of virtual restaurants featuring local and international cuisines, enabling customers to order a wide range of meals through a user-friendly app and have them delivered directly to their location.
one_liner: Opeartor of a multi-brand delivery-only restaurant platform designed for consumers looking for a variety of food options. The company's platform offers a selection of virtual restaurants featuring local and international cuisines, enabling customers to order a wide range of meals through a user-friendly app and have them delivered directly to their location.

name: Haseel Company Holding LTD
description: Developer of an online grocery application designed to offer fresh produce of vegetables and fruits available each season. The company's application provides users with the option to order fresh vegetables and fruits online and get them delivered to the location of their preference, enabling users to get an easy-to-use application that offers an affordable and convenient way to order groceries.
one_liner: Developer of an online grocery application designed to offer fresh produce of vegetables and fruits available each season. The company's application provides users with the option to order fresh vegetables and fruits online and get them delivered to the location of their preference, enabling users to get an easy-to-use application that offers an affordable and convenient way to order groceries.

name: Hey Group GmbH
description: Provider of catering, cooking, and food delivery services intended to offer a marketplace for connecting chefs with the people. The company's services help in organizing delicious food for people seeking tailored catering services for any event or party, enabling people to connect with caterers, food trucks, and private chefs to get their desired food and place bulk orders from their preferred vendors.
one_liner: Provider of catering, cooking, and food delivery services intended to offer a marketplace for connecting chefs with the people. The company's services help in organizing delicious food for people seeking tailored catering services for any event or party, enabling people to connect with caterers, food trucks, and private chefs to get their desired food and place bulk orders from their preferred vendors.

name: AppServation Co., Ltd.
description: Developer of a fixed-price dining application designed to offer buffet deals and share set menus. The company's platform permits diners to know food bills upfront before entering restaurants as well as assists restaurants to drive revenue through sustainable promotions, enabling restaurants to improve their customer engagement in food service.
one_liner: Developer of a fixed-price dining application designed to offer buffet deals and share set menus. The company's platform permits diners to know food bills upfront before entering restaurants as well as assists restaurants to drive revenue through sustainable promotions, enabling restaurants to improve their customer engagement in food service.

name: JuiceInnov8 Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of a food biotechnology company intended to reinvent the juice industry with a sugar-free and healthier juice. The company's mission is to build the next generation of food & beverage that is healthier for everyone and greater for this planet with the power of biology, uses non-genetically modified microbes to reduce the amount of sugar and calories contained in juices without water dilution, enabling juice producers to customize the amount of natural sugar in their beverages.
one_liner: Developer of a food biotechnology company intended to reinvent the juice industry with a sugar-free and healthier juice. The company's mission is to build the next generation of food & beverage that is healthier for everyone and greater for this planet with the power of biology, uses non-genetically modified microbes to reduce the amount of sugar and calories contained in juices without water dilution, enabling juice producers to customize the amount of natural sugar in their beverages.

name: Jago International Pte. Ltd.
description: Jago International Pte. Ltd. is the Singapore-incorporated holding company. The group operates its Jago Coffee business in Indonesia through its wholly-owned subsidiary, PT SATUAN TEKNOLOGI BERJALAN.
one_liner: Jago International Pte. Ltd. is the Singapore-incorporated holding company. The group operates its Jago Coffee business in Indonesia through its wholly-owned subsidiary, PT SATUAN TEKNOLOGI BERJALAN.

name: Kinkhao Co., Ltd.
description: Provider of catering services intended to serve food in events, gatherings and offices. The company's services include delivering diverse cuisines and meals that satisfy all dietary preferences and allow employees to make individual choices on the application daily instead of spending hours finding vendors who can bring in buffet-style meals, enabling users to book for office lunches, events and private chef for get togethers and parties.
one_liner: Provider of catering services intended to serve food in events, gatherings and offices. The company's services include delivering diverse cuisines and meals that satisfy all dietary preferences and allow employees to make individual choices on the application daily instead of spending hours finding vendors who can bring in buffet-style meals, enabling users to book for office lunches, events and private chef for get togethers and parties.

name: Kovzy Co.
description: Developer of restaurant tech platform designed to offer direct digital ordering, payment and delivery upports to restaurants. The company offers different delivery methods, manage the delivery radius around the branch and design templates of all online restaurants, enabling restaurant owners to set up their online restaurant and QR menu in less time and receive direct orders from your loyal customers.
one_liner: Developer of restaurant tech platform designed to offer direct digital ordering, payment and delivery upports to restaurants. The company offers different delivery methods, manage the delivery radius around the branch and design templates of all online restaurants, enabling restaurant owners to set up their online restaurant and QR menu in less time and receive direct orders from your loyal customers.

name: EdgiLife Media Inc.
description: Provider of an online food subscription platform designed to provide healthier food to consumers. The company's online food subscription platform offers all-natural, organic or gluten-free snacks with no cancellation fee and free home delivery, enabling users to try out new snacks every month before committing to full-size products, thereby saving time and money.
one_liner: Provider of an online food subscription platform designed to provide healthier food to consumers. The company's online food subscription platform offers all-natural, organic or gluten-free snacks with no cancellation fee and free home delivery, enabling users to try out new snacks every month before committing to full-size products, thereby saving time and money.

name: Mealogic, Inc.
description: Operator of a meal discovery platform intended to offer professionally prepared healthy meals. The company specializes in offering personalized meals pre-made and designed by local dietitians, nutritionists and chefs using good quality, sustainably sourced ingredients free of refined sugars, gluten and dairy for health-conscious consumers, enabling customers to indulge in freshly prepared food delivered to their doorstep.
one_liner: Operator of a meal discovery platform intended to offer professionally prepared healthy meals. The company specializes in offering personalized meals pre-made and designed by local dietitians, nutritionists and chefs using good quality, sustainably sourced ingredients free of refined sugars, gluten and dairy for health-conscious consumers, enabling customers to indulge in freshly prepared food delivered to their doorstep.

name: Meals In Minutes Sdn. Bhd.
description: Provider of ready-to-cook frozen meals intended to deliver food with convenience with the subscription. The company delivers portioned and prepped meals that are easy to prepare, comprising a variety of bases, sides, proteins, and even a burger, enabling starved individuals, mothers, and working couples to enjoy premium, halal, and healthy meals without spending much time on meal preparation.
one_liner: Provider of ready-to-cook frozen meals intended to deliver food with convenience with the subscription. The company delivers portioned and prepped meals that are easy to prepare, comprising a variety of bases, sides, proteins, and even a burger, enabling starved individuals, mothers, and working couples to enjoy premium, halal, and healthy meals without spending much time on meal preparation.

name: Pantry Retail, Inc.
description: Provider of refrigerated vending kiosks for the food-service market. The company provides instant access to fresh food through a network of swipe, grab and go kiosks. Its local food partners curate a seasonal menu of fresh meals, snacks and beverages for the kiosks. The company deploys its kiosks across the US to workplaces, hospitals, universities and hotels.
one_liner: Provider of refrigerated vending kiosks for the food-service market. The company provides instant access to fresh food through a network of swipe, grab and go kiosks. Its local food partners curate a seasonal menu of fresh meals, snacks and beverages for the kiosks. The company deploys its kiosks across the US to workplaces, hospitals, universities and hotels.

name: Prefer Pte. Ltd.
description: Producer of bean-free coffee intended to provide a product that mimics the coffee bean. The company produces coffee without coffee beans by fermenting surplus food, enabling customers to obtain environmentally sustainable and affordable products.
one_liner: Producer of bean-free coffee intended to provide a product that mimics the coffee bean. The company produces coffee without coffee beans by fermenting surplus food, enabling customers to obtain environmentally sustainable and affordable products.

name: Como Quiero Inc.
description: Transforming inspiration into transactions
one_liner: Transforming inspiration into transactions

name: PT. Eatiki
description: Operator of a restaurant review and booking platform intended to help people find restaurants in Indonesia. The company's platform offers user-generated reviews, ratings and photos along with recommendations and promo offers at any participating restaurant, enabling culinary connoisseurs and travelers to find interesting restaurants and events and make hassle-free reservations and earn dining points.
one_liner: Operator of a restaurant review and booking platform intended to help people find restaurants in Indonesia. The company's platform offers user-generated reviews, ratings and photos along with recommendations and promo offers at any participating restaurant, enabling culinary connoisseurs and travelers to find interesting restaurants and events and make hassle-free reservations and earn dining points.

name: Retailo Group Holding Limited
description: Developer of an online marketplace platform designed to address issues within the informal retail market. The company's platform provides access to a list of suppliers and products to order along with delivery services, enabling retailers, manufacturers, distributors, and wholesalers to save money and improve their working capital requirements and inventory management.
one_liner: Developer of an online marketplace platform designed to address issues within the informal retail market. The company's platform provides access to a list of suppliers and products to order along with delivery services, enabling retailers, manufacturers, distributors, and wholesalers to save money and improve their working capital requirements and inventory management.

name: RVDS Inc.
description: Operator of a K-Food franchise platform focused on scaling Korean cuisine across Southeast Asia through brand localization and operational excellence. The company operates DoDoKorea, a fast-growing Korean lunchbox quick-service restaurant that has gained viral popularity in Kuala Lumpur.
one_liner: Operator of a K-Food franchise platform focused on scaling Korean cuisine across Southeast Asia through brand localization and operational excellence. The company operates DoDoKorea, a fast-growing Korean lunchbox quick-service restaurant that has gained viral popularity in Kuala Lumpur.

name: SimplyCook Limited
description: Provider of a subscription-based service designed to make cooking new meals accessible for all. The company's subscription-based service offers new concept recipe kits containing recipe cards and natural ingredient blends with culinary taste ingredients, enabling its members to expand their meal repertoire with ease.
one_liner: Provider of a subscription-based service designed to make cooking new meals accessible for all. The company's subscription-based service offers new concept recipe kits containing recipe cards and natural ingredient blends with culinary taste ingredients, enabling its members to expand their meal repertoire with ease.

name: Wholeshare, Inc.
description: Provider of an online marketplace for sustainably produced food. The company offers an e-commerce platform for natural and organic local food at wholesale prices, through group purchases.
one_liner: Provider of an online marketplace for sustainably produced food. The company offers an e-commerce platform for natural and organic local food at wholesale prices, through group purchases.
